queries.name: Refined Query V2 (Property-Specific: Volume Fraction)
queries.description: Uses Component = Erythrocyte AND Property = Volume fraction (118586006) to separate Hematocrit from RBC count (which uses Number concentration). This prevents cross-contamination between measurements that share the same Component.
